DOC.brief_summary: The objective study compare heal wound induced cryo-injury treat white petrolatum versus ointment vehicle .
DOC.brief_title: Controlled Study Effect Xenaderm® Ointment Vehicle Versus White Petrolatum Healing
DOC.criteria: Subjects consider qualified enrollment : Provide write informed consent , consist reading , signing , date informed consent document Investigator , subInvestigator designate study staff member explain study procedure , risk contact information . Are male female , ≥ 18 year age , race . Are willing attend require study visit , comply study procedure . Meet none exclusion criterion ( single exclusion criterion meet potential subject disqualify subject participation study ) . Subjects consider NOT qualified enrollment : Have history dermatomyositis , systemic sclerosis , scleroderma , Sjögren 's syndrome , systemic lupus erythematosis , discoid lupus , Ehler 's Danlos disease , icthyosis vulgaris , vasculitis bleeding disorder ( coagulopathies ) . Have dermatologic disease may aggravate provoke wounding procedure , Lichen Planus , Psoriasis Vitiligo . Have Fitzpatrick scale skin type 6 ( never sunburn , deeply pigment ) . Are risk keloid hypertrophic scar formation , base personal history , family history , brief skin exam ( conduct screen visit look keloid hypertrophic scar ) . Have treat within last three month uncontrolled diabetes mellitus , peripheral vascular disease , vitamin C deficiency , connective tissue disorder , disease process impede wound heal . Are take concomitant medication dos know interfere heal , nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug , antineoplastic drug , immunosuppressive drug . Are use topical glycolic acid product , alphahydroxy acid product , retinoids chemical peel agent treatment area . Are use systemic steroid immunosuppressant agent , use drug within past three month .
